name: Hong Anh Hotel - Lang Ha
address: 3F/81, Lang Ha Street, Thanh Cong, Ba Dinh, Dong Da District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Whether you're a tourist or traveling on business, Hong Anh Hotel - Lang Ha is a great choice for accommodation when visiting Hanoi. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. For those of you who want to venture out, Embassy of The United States, Vietnam Exhibition and Fair Centre, Benh Vien Mat Sai Gon - Ha Noi are just some of the attractions available to visitors.

At Hong Anh Hotel - Lang Ha, the excellent service and superior facilities make for an unforgettable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service, family room, laundry service are just a few of the facilities that set Hong Anh Hotel - Lang Ha apart from other hotels in the city.

24 rooms spread over 5 floors provide a warm and pleasant home away from home. Modern comforts such as internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, desk, mini bar can be found in selected rooms. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Whatever your reason for visiting Hanoi, the Hong Anh Hotel - Lang Ha is the perfect venue for an exhilarating and exciting break away.

places.name: Benh Vien Mat Sai Gon - Ha Noi
